short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dopplio's Chrome Extension to automatically take full-page screenshots

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will allow you to easily take full-page screenshots and load them into a Dopplio video generation with one click.

- No more downloading images only to upload them again, just click "Load From Extension" on the generation page

If you have any questions about this extension, feel free email our support team at support@dopplio.com or directly via the live chat.
